title: Enjoining order against removing Nimal Siripala from SLFP posts
body_lines: The Colombo District Court today (June 07) issued an enjoining order preventing Minister Nimal Siripala de Silva from being removed from all positions he holds in the Sri Lanka Freedom Party (SLFP).
It was issued after taking into consideration a petition out forward by the lawmaker.
This enjoining order will be effective until the 20th of June.
